Literature.Title: Defensing role of novel piscidins from largemouth bass (Micropterus salmoides) with evidence of bactericidal activities and inducible expressional delineation.
Literature.Author: Duan Y, Ouyang J, Mo G, Hao W, Zhang P, Yang H, Liu X, Wang R, Cao B, Wang Y, Yu H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(MIC=>200µg/ml),Nocardia asteroides(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio brasiliensis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio fluvialis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio splendidus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio vulnificus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=>200µg/ml),Aeromonas sobria(MIC=>200µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii(MIC=>200µg/ml)
